mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms_tasks (user_id, instance_id, receiver_numbers, message_contents, sent_count, reply_count, total_count, status, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{instanceId}, #{receiverNumbers}, #{messageContents}, #{sentCount}, #{replyCount}, #{totalCount}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, instance_id, receiver_numbers, message_contents, sent_count, reply_count, total_count, status, created_at FROM sms_tasks WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
